functionDecorators.name: addStaker
functionDecorators.description: Mark the given staker as staked on this node.

parameterDecorators.name: staker
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the staker to mark.

returnDecorators.description: The number of stakers after adding this one.

functionDecorators.name: challengeHash
functionDecorators.description: Hash of the data that can be challenged.

functionDecorators.name: confirmData
functionDecorators.description: Hash of the data that will be committed if this node is confirmed.

functionDecorators.name: deadlineBlock
functionDecorators.description: Deadline at which this node can be confirmed.

functionDecorators.name: firstChildBlock
functionDecorators.description: This value starts at zero and is set to a value when the first child is created. After that it is constant until the node is destroyed or the owner destroys pending nodes.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Mark the given staker as staked on this node.

functionDecorators.name: latestChildNumber
functionDecorators.description: The number of the latest child of this node to be created.

functionDecorators.name: noChildConfirmedBeforeBlock
functionDecorators.description: Deadline at which a child of this node can be confirmed.

functionDecorators.name: prev
functionDecorators.description: Index of the node previous to this one.

functionDecorators.name: removeStaker
functionDecorators.description: Remove the given staker from this node.

parameterDecorators.name: staker
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the staker to remove.

functionDecorators.name: requirePastChildConfirmDeadline
functionDecorators.description: Check whether the current block number has met or passed deadline for children of this node to be confirmed.

functionDecorators.name: requirePastDeadline
functionDecorators.description: Check whether the current block number has met or passed the node's deadline.

functionDecorators.name: rollup
functionDecorators.description: Address of the rollup contract to which this node belongs.

functionDecorators.name: stakerCount
functionDecorators.description: Number of stakers staked on this node. This includes real stakers and zombies.

functionDecorators.name: stakers
functionDecorators.description: Mapping of the stakers staked on this node with true if they are staked. This includes real stakers and zombies.

functionDecorators.name: stateHash
functionDecorators.description: Hash of the state of the chain as of this node.
